entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
